5 kerbins!!!!!! How I will must control them??( I use one, another flying away:((( But I was collected all of them in 1 point. After I was use G, but the truss S0 have yellow color and I was recive message: too far... May be it is happening because my truss S0 moving too far?

I will must constructing this station!!! )))

Yes, you should try and keep both your kerbal and S0 as close to the node on Z1 as possible, KIS has a range,

I don't how I do this. 5 kerbals... I will must control all of them:( But they drift and fly away:(( Also I will must controlled move part S0

FlyMeToTheMinmus: Are you complete this stage? I mean attach Truss S0. And you also using KIS for this, right?

I guess so. To help with kerbals flying away I would suggest using KIS to attach small ladders to s0, and then the other kerbals can stay attached to them.

ÃÂ¡onstruction continues But I have a lot of comments. No instructions for installing modules. You do not know which module should be atach with a docking port and what a module with using KIS . You have to lose a lot of time if you want to understand that . It's annoying
Looking for suggestions on how I should modify or add/remove from mod. Will get back onto it when I can. (Have been busy with other things)
Its a bit laggy in Part Count. Also oh my god, you're back!
I'd say an update on the textures would be nice on some of the parts. IVA too. Otherwise I can't think of anything.

Looking for suggestions on how I should modify or add/remove from mod. Will get back onto it when I can. (Have been busy with other things)

HEY ITS MIKE!!!! also maybe a low res version if possible?

I've actually done testing with the ISS, and the lag isn't due to part count, it's actually caused by the Solar Arrays. I don't know what it about them that causes lag, but I know the lag without the solar arrays is significantly less than it is with them.

I've actually done testing with the ISS, and the lag isn't due to part count, it's actually caused by the Solar Arrays. I don't know what it about them that causes lag, but I know the lag without the solar arrays is significantly less than it is with them.

Could be too much animation...? I will try for a remake

- - - Updated - - -

And higher and lower textures. I did try lower part cound with built in dock ports
Is the mod currently compatible with 1.0.5?

[quote name='Dnaha']Is the mod currently compatible with 1.0.5?[/QUOTE]

If it has modulercsfx in the configs it wont load, otherwise it should work. Still needs update/overhaul to fix its bugs

Just to keep everyone updated, I've started a new release thread for the Dreamer... I've updated it for 1.0.5 (wow did things get toasty quick!) and done a bit of tweaking here and there. I've also removed all references to any real world craft it may have been partially inspired by... in order to avoid angering any real companies who don't understand the value of getting a bunch of science minded people excited about their space craft...

I cannot say ENOUGH how much I appreciate Mike-NZ keeping the ship alive and making so many improvements along the way!
its not working with 1.5
What is going wrong with it?  I can gladly forward this information to Mike for you!

19 hours ago, Sampa said:

What is going wrong with it?  I can gladly forward this information to Mike for you!

its not loading ..at startup .. sticking . 1.05 Vanila. 

and if you can please till mike that ISS with RSS and RO need an update ..

i dont know but Mike with doing update every week now for the last 3 months no updates what happend??

Ok, I will forward this to Mike.

 

To answer your question about why Mike has not updated this as often as he used to, it is mainly because mike had been gone for several months dealing with life issues.  He has recently returned and is presently working on a patch and update for the shuttle, probable completion being around when 1.1 drops.
